mapper.select:
SELECT bm.bm_no, bm.bm_title, bm.bm_writer, bm.bm_content, bm.bm_pw, bs.bs_file, bm.bm_hit, bm.bm_group, bm.bm_pos, bm.bm_step, bm.bm_reg FROM board_master_t bm, board_sub_t bs WHERE bm.bm_no = bs.bm_no(+)
AND bm.bm_no = #{bm_no}
AND bm_reg LIKE '%'||#{bm_reg}||'%'
AND bm_title LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm_content LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm_writer LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
ORDER BY bm.bm_group DESC, bm.bm_step ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_master_t (bm_no, bm_title, bm_writer, bm_content, bm_pw, bm_reg, bm_hit, bm_group, bm_pos, bm_step) VALUES (#{bm_no}, #{bm_title}, #{bm_writer}, #{bm_content}, #{bm_pw}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0, #{bm_group}, #{bm_pos}, #{bm_step})
INSERT INTO board_sub_t(bm_no, bs_seq, bs_file, bs_size) VALUES(#{bm_no}, 1, #{bs_file}, #{bs_size})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL ( (SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master_t BOARD_BM_NO_PK) */ bm_no FROM board_master_t WHERE ROWNUM = 1), 0)+1 bm_no FROM DUAL
SELECT NVL ( (SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master_t i_board_group) */ bm_group FROM board_master_t WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND bm_group > 0), 0)+1 bm_group FROM DUAL
